product_name: The North Face Warm Boot-Top Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you wear them under your ski pants or inside your sleeping bag, the Warm Boot-Top long underwear bottoms from The North Face provide warmth with soft texture and a snug fit.
